languages.text: "Самосуд на Футфоле — дело нередкое. Чему этот святоша так удивляется?" {n}Джай непривычно мрачно глядит на собравшихся.{/n} "В жизни мало кто дает себе труд разобраться..."

traits.locale_text: "Самосуд на Футфоле — дело нередкое. Чему этот святоша так удивляется? Всего лишь закон природы — бей первый, да побольнее, пока не побили тебя". {n}Джай непривычно мрачно глядит на собравшихся.{/n} "В жизни мало кого интересует истина. Кто сильнее — тот и оказывается прав".

languages.text: "Mob justice is not that rare a sight on Footfall. Why is that sanctimonious priest acting so surprised?" {n}Jae gives the crowd an unusually grim look.{/n} "Few people go to the trouble of looking more deeply into things..."
languages.original_text: "Самосуд на Футфоле — дело нередкое. Чему этот святоша так удивляется?" {n}Джай непривычно мрачно глядит на собравшихся.{/n} "В жизни мало кто дает себе труд разобраться..."

traits.locale_text: "Mob justice is not that rare a sight on Footfall. Why is that goody-goody priest acting so surprised?" {n}Jae gives the crowd an unusually grim look.{/n} "Few people care about getting to the bottom of things..."

"Mob justice is not that rare a sight on Footfall. Why is that goody-goody priest acting so surprised?" {n}Jae gives the crowd an unusually grim look.{/n} "Few people care about getting to the bottom of things..."

"Mob justice is not that rare a sight on Footfall. Why is that sanctimonious priest acting so surprised?" {n}Jae gives the crowd an unusually grim look.{/n} "Few people go to the trouble of looking more deeply into things..."

"Mob justice is not that rare a sight on Footfall. Why is that sanctimonious priest acting so surprised?" {n}Jae gives the crowd an unusually grim look.{/n} "Few people go to the trouble of looking more deeply into things..."

"Mob justice is not that rare a sight on Footfall. Why is that sanctimonious priest acting so surprised?" {n}Jae gives the crowd an unusually grim look.{/n} "Few people go to the trouble of looking more deeply into things..."

languages.text: 「暴徒による正義はフットフォールではそれほど珍しい光景ではないわ。あの尊大な司祭は、なんでそんなに驚いているの？」{n}ジェイは珍しく険しい表情を群衆に向けた。{/n}「わざわざ面倒ごとに巻き込まれにいくとはね…」
languages.original_text: "Mob justice is not that rare a sight on Footfall. Why is that sanctimonious priest acting so surprised?" {n}Jae gives the crowd an unusually grim look.{/n} "Few people go to the trouble of looking more deeply into things..."

traits.locale_text: 「暴徒による正義はフットフォールではそれほど珍しい光景ではないわ。あの尊大な司祭は、なんでそんなに驚いているの？」{n}ジェイは珍しく険しい表情を群衆に向けた。{/n}「わざわざ面倒ごとに巻き込まれにいくとはね…」

languages.text: “暴民的正义在落脚港并不罕见，但为什么那位道貌岸然的牧师看起来那么惊讶？”{n}婕伊异常严肃地看着人群。{/n}“很少有人愿意花费精力，更加深入地观察事物……”
languages.original_text: "Mob justice is not that rare a sight on Footfall. Why is that sanctimonious priest acting so surprised?" {n}Jae gives the crowd an unusually grim look.{/n} "Few people go to the trouble of looking more deeply into things..."

traits.locale_text: “暴民的正义在落脚港并不罕见，但为什么那位道貌岸然的牧师看起来那么惊讶？”{n}婕伊异常严肃地看着人群。{/n}“很少有人愿意花费精力，更加深入地观察事物……”

languages.text: «En Paso es normal que la gente se tome la justicia por su mano. ¿Por qué se sorprende tanto el mojigato del sacerdote?». {n}Jae dedica a la multitud una mirada más siniestra de lo normal.{/n} «La gente es que no se para a ver más allá de las cosas...».
languages.original_text: "Mob justice is not that rare a sight on Footfall. Why is that sanctimonious priest acting so surprised?" {n}Jae gives the crowd an unusually grim look.{/n} "Few people go to the trouble of looking more deeply into things..."

traits.locale_text: «En Paso es normal que la gente se tome la justicia por su mano. ¿Por qué se sorprende tanto el mojigato del sacerdote?». {n}Jae dedica a la multitud una mirada más siniestra de lo normal.{/n} «La gente es que no se para a ver más allá de las cosas...».

languages.text: « Les lynchages ne sont pas rares à Castel. Pourquoi ce prêtre moralisateur semble-t-il aussi scandalisé ? La plupart des gens ne cherchent pas à voir plus loin que le bout de leur nez... » {n}ajoute Jae en parcourant la foule d'un air étonnamment morne.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Mob justice is not that rare a sight on Footfall. Why is that sanctimonious priest acting so surprised?" {n}Jae gives the crowd an unusually grim look.{/n} "Few people go to the trouble of looking more deeply into things..."

traits.locale_text: « Les lynchages ne sont pas rares à Castel. Pourquoi ce prêtre moralisateur semble-t-il aussi scandalisé ? La plupart des gens ne cherchent pas à voir plus loin que le bout de leur nez... » {n}ajoute Jae en parcourant la foule d'un air étonnamment morne.{/n}

languages.text: "Lynchjustiz ist auf Footfall keine Seltenheit. Warum wirkt dieser scheinheilige Priester so überrascht?" {n}Jae betrachtet die Menge ungewöhnlich grimmig.{/n} "Nur wenige machen sich die Mühe, den Dingen auf den Grund zu gehen ..."
languages.original_text: "Mob justice is not that rare a sight on Footfall. Why is that sanctimonious priest acting so surprised?" {n}Jae gives the crowd an unusually grim look.{/n} "Few people go to the trouble of looking more deeply into things..."

traits.locale_text: "Lynchjustiz ist auf Footfall keine Seltenheit. Warum wirkt dieser scheinheilige Priester so überrascht?" {n}Jae betrachtet die Menge ungewöhnlich grimmig.{/n} "Nur wenige machen sich die Mühe, den Dingen auf den Grund zu gehen ..."

languages.text: "Binliman'da güruhların kendi adaletini sağlaması nadir durum değildir. Dindarlık taslayan rahip niye bu kadar şaştı ki?" {n}Jae, kalabalığa her zamankinden sert bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Çok az kişi bir şeyleri derinlemesine düşünme zahmetine girer."
languages.original_text: "Mob justice is not that rare a sight on Footfall. Why is that sanctimonious priest acting so surprised?" {n}Jae gives the crowd an unusually grim look.{/n} "Few people go to the trouble of looking more deeply into things..."

traits.locale_text: "Binliman'da insanların adaleti kendi ellerine alması nadir bir durum değil. Şu dindarlık taslayan rahip neden bu kadar şaşırıyor ki?" {n}Jae kalabalığa her zamankinden daha katı bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Bir şeyleri derinlemesine düşünme zahmetine giren fazla kişi yoktur."
